content: errata i have updated the pattern to correct an error all hdcssflo half_double_crochet slip_stitch front loop only should just be hdcss half_double_crochet slip_stitch i also added finished measurements for the hat when laid flat before seaming the revised pdf is now available this hat is crocheted flat in row folded in half and seamed together then cinched closed at the top the beanie is one size to fit the average woman s head but circumference is easily adjustable by adding or subtracting the number of row you will need a p 11 5mm hook scissors needle to weave in ends and one skein of lion brand thick and quick yarn other size 6 super bulky yarn can be used but i have not tested other yarns
